short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn forgotten bookmarks into rediscovered treasures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BookmarkBear: Breathe life into your bookmarks.

This smart extension reminds you of great content you've saved, surfacing relevant bookmarks as you browse and showcasing random gems from your collection. Turn forgotten bookmarks into rediscovered treasures, ensuring the best of the web stays at your fingertips.
